news_header: Elon Musk, a billionaire and supporter of Donald Trump, has founded a Super PAC named America PAC to enhance Republican voter support in key states, particularly Pennsylvania.
news_text: Elon Musk, the billionaire founder of America PAC, is actively campaigning for Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump in Pennsylvania. Musk plans to deliver speeches from Wednesday to Monday, emphasizing his commitment to support Trump in crucial states. He has previously expressed his backing for Trump, especially following a campaign conference they attended together. Musk has reportedly funded America PAC with $75 million, aiming to improve voter turnout for Republicans in pivotal areas during the elections.
